title: Banned for league crashing
body:
So I joined q and the match came up however league froze and i didnt get to accept the match. Then league suddenly when all white then i had to alt f4. Now i have to wait 15 min b4 i join a game.
rito pls help
Minpin04 oce

replies.body: If you didn't accept one match because of a glitch, that should not happen.
